summary: The test package provides comprehensive unit and end‑to‑end validation for the Docling document conversion library. It covers backend parsers for AsciiDoc, HTML, MS Word, PDF (via PDFium and DoclingParse), and OCR pipelines, checks CLI functionality, input handling, conversion options, legacy format transformation, and includes utility functions for result verification.
business_intent: Guarantee that the document conversion system reliably processes various source formats, respects configuration options, produces correct internal models and legacy outputs, and that the command‑line interface operates as documented.
